paper_abstract: The Manitoo library is devoted to the resolution of analytical non-linear problems using a high order method called asymptotic numerical method. We describe here the Object Oriented design of this library and especially the choices made to obtain a quite generic and flexible numerical solver. Through classical examples, we present a comparison with some existing tools implemented in Matlab and Fortran 77. (C) 2012 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Object-oriented design to automate a high order non-linear solver based on asymptotic numerical method
